title: RRB Clerk Prelims: Quant (6th Dec Shift 2) #QA016

questions.text: A 42-liter mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 2:5, respectively. After adding some quantity of milk, the ratio of water to milk becomes 1:4. Find the quantity of milk added (in liters).

A and B together can complete a piece of work in 15 days, while B alone can complete it in 36 days. If both A and B start working together, but B leaves 6 days before the work is finished, find the total time taken by A to complete the remaining work.
questions.solution: LCM(15,36)=180. A+B=12, B=5, A=7. Let total time be T. A works T days, B works T-6 days. 7T + 5(T-6) = 180 => 12T = 210 => T = 17.5 days. (Note: Question wording suggests total duration).

questions.text: The breadth of a rectangle is 25% less than the length of the rectangle. If the perimeter of the rectangle is 70 cm, then find the area of the rectangle (in cmÂ²).

A shopkeeper allowed a 20% discount off the marked price of an article. If he earned a profit of Rs 450 and the difference between the cost price and marked price of the article is Rs 1900, then find the cost price of the article (in Rs).
A can travel 54 km in 2 hours. If the speed of A is 20% more than the speed of B, then how many km are travelled by B in 4 hours (in km)?
questions.solution: Speed A = 27 km/h. 27 = 1.2 * Speed B => Speed B = 22.5 km/h. Distance = 22.5 * 4 = 90 km.

questions.text: The upstream speed of a boat is 6 km/hr, and the speed of a stream is 2 km/hr Find the time taken by the boat to cover 80 km downstream (in hours).
questions.solution: Upstream = B - S = 6. S = 2 => B = 8. Downstream = B + S = 10. Time = 80/10 = 8.

questions.text: A, B, and C started a business with investments of Rs 2800, Rs 5400, and Rs 3600, respectively. After 8 months, A left the business, and at the end of the year, the profit share of B is Rs 2430. Find the total profit (in Rs).

A man invested Rs X in compound interest at 10% p.a. for three years and received interest of Rs 1324. If he invested Rs (X+500) in simple interest for two years at 15% p.a., then find the simple interest he received (in Rs).
Pipe A can fill a tank in 15 hours and Pipe B can fill it in 20 hours. Both pipes are opened together, but after 4 hours, Pipe A is closed. Find the total time (in hours) taken to fill the tank.
Two trains of lengths 180 m and 120 m are moving in opposite directions at speeds of 54 km/h and 72 km/h respectively. How long will they take to completely cross each other (in seconds)?
questions.solution: Rel Speed = 126 km/h = 35 m/s. Dist = 300m. Time = 300/35 = 60/7 sec.

questions.text: Find the missing term: 2, 4, 12, ?, 240, 1440
Find the missing term: 1600, 1088, 1039, 823, 798, ?
Find the missing term: 147, ?, 111, 88, 59, 28
Find the missing term: 148, ?, 203, 243, 294, 358, 437
questions.solution: Double diff series logic leads to 172.

questions.text: What will come in place of (?): 50 - 45 + 145 = 2.5 * ?
What will come in place of (?): Sqrt(225)/Sqrt(25) * 6 = ?% of 200
What will come in place of (?): 16 * 25 + 280 - 25^2 = 25% of ?
What will come in place of (?): Sqrt(49 * Sqrt(196)) + 430 = ?^2 - 48
questions.solution: Sqrt(49*14) + 430 = ?^2 - 48. Assuming typo in source, logic led to 576 = ?^2 => 24.

questions.text: What will come in place of (?): 118 + Sqrt(484) + 6/13 * 260 + ? = 17^2
What will come in place of (?): 108/3 * 5 - 225/9 * 4 = 400% of ?
What will come in place of (?): 40% of 825 = 16.66% of 1260 + ?
What will come in place of (?): 18/1.5 + 153/17 + Sqrt(256) = 629/?
What will come in place of (?): (110 + 70 - Sqrt(6400))/25 + ? = 4^2
What will come in place of (?): (25% of 680) / (50% of 340) = ?
What will come in place of (?): 15% of 60 of 36000 = 12 * ?^3
What will come in place of (?): (4/10.5) * Sqrt(441) - Sqrt(25) = Sqrt(?)
What will come in place of (?): 12.5% of 400 = ? - 60% of 1800
What will come in place of (?): (36^0.5 + 169^0.5) * ? = 95
